name: Copter Classic 2
description:
Beside to avoid obstacles , copter has not much fuel remained. It needs to refuel in air, otherwise will fall after use up fuel. It’s easy to play. Try it, hope you will enjoy it. Have fun！

Game Feature
~Easy operation. Please press and hold your finger on the screen to go up , release to go down.
~Blood stripe indicates fuel level.
~Suitable for all family, everybody can enjoy the game !
~ World ranking
